[{"id": "header1", "type": "header", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\udee1\ufe0f Flansa Platform Administration", "col": 12}}, {"id": "para1", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "Super Admin portal for managing tenants and platform configuration", "col": 12}}, {"id": "spacer1", "type": "spacer", "data": {"col": 12}}, {"id": "subheader1", "type": "header", "data": {"text": "Tenant Management", "col": 12}}, {"id": "link_platform_role_manager", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\udc65 Platform Role Manager - Manage platform-wide roles and permissions", "col": 6}}, {"id": "link_workspace", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83c\udfe2 Flansa Workspace - Manage applications by tenant (main entry point for builders)", "col": 6}}, {"id": "link_workspace_switcher", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\udd04 Workspace Builder - Switch between different tenant contexts", "col": 6}}, {"id": "link_tenant_registration", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\u2795 Register Tenant - Create and configure new tenants", "col": 6}}, {"id": "spacer2", "type": "spacer", "data": {"col": 12}}, {"id": "subheader2", "type": "header", "data": {"text": "System Tools", "col": 12}}, {"id": "link_database", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\uddc4\ufe0f Database Viewer - Direct database access and query tool", "col": 6}}, {"id": "spacer3", "type": "spacer", "data": {"col": 12}}, {"id": "info_note", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "
\u2139\ufe0f Navigation Hierarchy:
\u2022 Flansa Workspace \u2192 Lists apps per tenant
\u2022 App Dashboard \u2192 Lists tables within selected app
\u2022 Visual Builder \u2192 Shows fields within selected table

Tenant builders and end users should primarily access the Flansa Workspace page.
", "col": 12}}]
